attributes.background: Political parties involved in the 2015 general elections have undergone major changes to key leading figures. Given the results of the EU referendum, citizens of the U.K should be given the opportunity to reinstate a competent government. To Lead Britain out of Europe and unify it's people.

rejection.details: In any case, we already have a petition calling for a general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133548
